Text:
http://us.yesasia.com/en/PrdDept.aspx/pid-1003244477/code-k/section-videos/

Starring Kim Ho-Jung and Kang Hye-Jung.

In this film, "Nabi" means butterfly that can lead the three characters to the oblivion virus in the future Seoul. German-Korean Anna comes to the future to forget her sad past, when she lost her baby during pregnancy. Another pregnant lady Yuki is suggested not to have abortion. Driver K, who lost his memory, seeks his past in the future. But everytime when they nearly get the virus, it disappears...
Do me a favor - somebody seed!
